Knolist is a research tool…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the Knolist Chrome Extension to save sources and highlight content for your Knolist projects.

Knolist is a research tool designed to simplify the process of gathering information, make it easier to be organized and view that information, and improve our users’ ability to generate new and insightful ideas. With Knolist, you can easily highlight and store content from web sources, organize your saved information in a graphical manner, search through that information quickly, structure items into clusters, get inspired with "Minigames" that use the information you stored to help you find insights, automatically generate citations, and share your projects with other people you’re working with. 

To learn more about us, visit https://knolist.com, or find our app at https://app.knolist.com
